thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 39 of 3060
thread.title: LLOYD LOGAN

author: LLOYD LOGAN
title: LLOYD LOGAN
text:
I made a prepaid reservation to rent a car from Sixt at Piarco International Airport from Jan 25 to February 1st 2017.
Before conscenting to rent the car, Sixt demanded an additional deposit of $500.00 U.S. I found this additional demand irrational because I was not forewarned about this development. Since I could not assure Sixt about this additional requirement I could not get the rental car. This left me unable to fulfill what I thought was a done deal.
Since I did not get the rental car as promised, I hereby ask that my deposit be refunded to me immediately.
Thanks.
